startup.flag: t/f for waiting for gps, then broadcasting aprs
startup.gps_lock_time: how long to wait for gps
startup.aprs_max_time: number of broadcasts with transmission once/30sec

aprs.comp_format: true: compressed message format, false: standard format
aprs.freq_lock: frequency to lock to, otherwise will be based on gps coords

timing.day_trigger: time that triggers the 'start' of a day(ie, 14 is 2pm): -1 means no day/night switch
timing.night_trigger: time that triggers the 'start' of night: -1 means no day/night switch
timing.day_timing: time between daytime messages: -1 means no day/night switch
timing.night_timing: time between nighttime messages: -1 means no day/night switch
timing.deep_sleep_trigger: t/f trigger to deep sleep when low battery

simulation.sim_move: whether or not to slightly move the sim gps location around
simulation.sim_tag_tx: t/f send tag messages or not
